ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hello
ygData.msgSnippet: ... getting killed is part of the game: don t be afraid of it! there are only a few zones where it is almost impossible to get back your corpse. but if you
ygData.messageBody:
> I have a question. I enjoy being an Enchantress because I am looking
> forward to some of the cool spells that I will eventually get (Charm,
> KEI, etc.) I just made Level 10 and am scared to death now because
> I'm afraid of getting killed, not being able to get back to my
> corpse, and losing all my stuff.

getting killed is part of the game: don't be afraid of it! there are only
a few zones where it is almost impossible to get back your corpse.
but if you really have equipment that must be recovered there are
three classes who you should be looking for:
- rogues: if you know the location where you died, but other
classes have problems to get there and back again, get an
rogue. the sneak&hide makes them invisible to most of the
critters throughout the world.
- necros & SKs: they can summon a corpse ... it isn't cheap,
but before you will loose some "special" items, they can help.


> I joined a website that lists quests and the levels you can complete
> the quests at, the site says you can complete the Stein of Moggok
> quest at level 8. I have components to make a Stein of Moggok, have
> the book to get another Stein, but when I try to give bartender Clurg
> the book, his body guard knocks me on my butt. And I can't use the
> Dark Elf Ill. spell until level 12, so why does everyone say that you
> can finish the quest at 8?

looks like you read many postings of inkies ... ;-)
yes, you are right, if you aren't a dark elf, you have to wait until 12.
but wait ... where is Clurg now? the trolls had to leave their home
tome and have to stay in neriak now ... %-&


> Are there any other quests that low-level Enchantress's can do to get
> nice equipment, money and experience?

my chantress is sort of an extra rare played alt. i don't know how i raised
her to 40. i never had to care about money with her, because she is pretty
much sponsored by my main... i started some quests with her, which i found
at http://everquest.allakhazam.com/ , but she got help from my main most
of the time. sorry, i can't help you much here.


good luck
- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, lvl 57 gnome magician, Tarew Marr
